Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='RTMKBW98')

BibliographicData.Title: Dual morphology and topography of the corticothalamic terminals originating from the primary, supplementary motor, and dorsal premotor cortical areas in macaque monkeys.
